subject: Soccer
lead_paragraph: Freddy Adu, the 18-year-old attacking midfielder, agreed to personal terms with Benfica in Lisbon, completing a $2 million move from M.L.S.
snippet: Freddy Adu, the 18-year-old attacking midfielder, agreed to personal terms with Benfica in Lisbon, completing a $2 million move from M.L.S.
